Table of Contents

Interface IWorkspacesClient

Represents the client interface for Workspaces SignalR hub. Defines about which actions in workspaces the client can be notified about

Namespace: Realtime_ToDo_Web_API.Hubs
Remarks

Does not notify about chenges in Workspace.Tasks or WorkspaceInfo.tasksCount.

Methods

AddWorkspace(WorkspaceInfo)

Notifies the client that a new workspace has been added.

Parameters

workspace WorkspaceInfo

The information of the added workspace.

DeleteWorkspace(int)

Notifies the client that a workspace has been deleted.

Parameters

workspaceId int

The ID of the workspace.

Error(string)

Notifies the client about an error that occurred.

Parameters

errorMessage string

The error message.

UpdateWorkspaceName(int, string)

Notifies the client that the name of a workspace has been updated.

Parameters

workspaceId int

The ID of the workspace.

name string

The updated name of the workspace.
